muclient:
Removes KXWT spam from output
atold1 = at1 at1 = "%3" at2 = "%4" at3 = "%5" atd = "%2"
Sound("stop=all") musicPlaying = false Execute ("mapper flag waypoint")
Note("%1")
kplayers={} kminions={} kotherminions={} kpcount = 0
--
Send("localecho DemonMUSH v3.02b "..uid)
Send("reply DemonMUSH v3.02b "..uid)
Send("reply DemonMUSH v3.02b "..uid)
Send("reply DemonMUSH v3.02b "..uid) print("the uuid is: "..uid)
set kxwt on set cprefix ~R~H[]~O l
l
nocastroom=true
k_cap=tonumber("%1")
print ZAPPED
Send("pang")
lag = tonumber("%1") if lag < 999.5 then lag = (math.floor(lag+0.5)).." ms" elseif lag < 9999.5 then lag = (math.floor(lag/10+0.5)/100).." s" else lag = (math.floor(lag/100+0.5)/10).." s" end if lagbrag then Send(lagbrag.." I currently have a connection lag of "..lag..".") lagbrag = nil else Note("Lag: "..lag) end
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- FAME TRIGGERS SECTION -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ColourTell ( "white","black", "( 6)", "yellow", "black", "(FAME)", "darkcyan", "black", " A wino sits on the ground, a bottle in his hand.")
ColourTell ( "mediumpurple", "black", "You will gain a ", "yellow","black", "(FAME)", "mediumpurple", "black", " point for killing A gypsy wino!")
ColourTell ( "white","black", "( 6)", "yellow", "black", "(FAME)", "darkcyan", "black", " An old man rests on a stool.")
ColourTell ( "mediumpurple", "black", "You will gain a ", "yellow","black", "(FAME)", "mediumpurple", "black", " point for killing An elderly gypsy man!")
ColourTell ( "white","black", "( 6)", "yellow", "black", "(FAME)", "darkcyan", "black", " A woman chats with her friend.")
ColourTell ( "mediumpurple", "black", "You will gain a ", "yellow","black", "(FAME)", "mediumpurple", "black", " point for killing An excited gypsy woman!")
ColourTell ( "white","black", "( 6)", "yellow", "black", "(FAME)", "darkcyan", "black", " A wizard is here, studying a magic tome.")
ColourTell ( "mediumpurple", "black", "You will gain a ", "yellow","black", "(FAME)", "mediumpurple", "black", " point for killing A travelling magician!")
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- COLOR TRIGGERS SECTION -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ColourNote("red", "", "GROUP: %1 has just been KILLED!")
ColourNote("blueviolet", "", "You drive a stake through %1 shadow, pinning it in place!")
ColourNote("lime", "", "Your sickening touch spreads to %1 as you hit %2!")
ColourNote("cyan", "", "%1 concentrates, and conjures a huge wall of ice.")
ColourNote("yellow", "", "WARNING: SANCTUARY DOWN")
ColourNote("lime", "black", "---------------------------") ColourNote("lime", "black", "| DOUBLE EXP MODE ENABLED |") ColourNote("lime", "black", "---------------------------")
ColourNote("lime", "black", "---------------------------") ColourNote("lime", "black", "| DOUBLE CAP MODE ENABLED |") ColourNote("lime", "black", "---------------------------")
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- SOUND TRIGGERS SECTION -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sound ("sounds/tell.wav")
Sound ("sounds/tell.wav")
Sound ("sounds/Purchase.wav")
Sound ("sounds/Item.wav")
Sound ("sounds/Walk.wav")
Sound ("sounds/demolishleap.wav")
Sound ("sounds/door.wav")
Sound ("sounds/door.wav")
Sound ("sounds/cleave.wav")
Sound ("sounds/random.wav")
Sound ("sounds/rottingsphere.wav")
Sound ("sounds/cackle.wav")
Sound ("sounds/cackle.wav")
Sound ("sounds/sancfall.wav")
Sound ("sounds/death.mp3")
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ -- MUSIC SECTION ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if musicPlaying == false then musicPlaying = true Sound("loop=sounds/Sothstore.mp3") end -- if musicPlaying
if musicPlaying == false then musicPlaying = true Sound("loop=sounds/entrancetohell.mp3") end -- if musicPlaying
if musicPlaying == false then musicPlaying = true Sound("loop=sounds/uw_ruins.mp3") end -- if musicPlaying
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ -- ALIASES SECTION ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Note(areanumber)
Sound("stop=all") musicPlaying = false ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Current Music Stopped.")
if debugging==1 then debugging=0 Note("debugging disabled") else Note("debugging enabled") debugging=1 end
if debugging==1 then debugging=0 Note("debugging disabled") else Note("debugging enabled") debugging=1 end
print(random(%1,%2))
lagbrag = nil Send("ping")
lagbrag="%1" Send("ping")
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ -- SOUND ALIAS SECTION ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sound("volume=0") ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Volume changed to 0.")
Sound("volume=10") ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Volume changed to 10.")
Sound("volume=20") ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Volume changed to 20.")
Sound("volume=30") ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Volume changed to 30.")
Sound("volume=40") ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Volume changed to 40.")
Sound("volume=50") ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Volume changed to 50.")
Sound("volume=60") ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Volume changed to 60.")
Sound("volume=70") ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Volume changed to 70.")
Sound("volume=80") ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Volume changed to 80.")
Sound("volume=90") ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Volume changed to 90.")
Sound("volume=100") ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Volume changed to 100.")
demonhelp()
demonhelp()
uid="" musicPlaying = false function OnPluginInstall() uid=GetVariable("id") if(uid==NIL) then uid=GetUniqueID () SetVariable("id",uid) end end function OnPluginSaveState () SetVariable("id",uid) end
function random(num1, num2) math.randomseed(os.time()) math.random(); math.random(); math.random(); math.random(); randomNumber = math.random(num1, num2) return randomNumber end
function demonhelp() ColourTell ("white", "black", " ^", "red", "black", ".", "white", "black", "_", "red", "black", ".", "white", "black", "^", "white", "black", " DemonMUSH Helper ", "white", "black", "^", "red", "black", ".", "white", "black", "_", "red", "black", ".", "white", "black", "^ ") ColourTell ("darkviolet", "black", "\n+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+") ColourTell ( "gainsboro","black", " Welcome to the DemonMUSH graphical client designed for Alter Aeon.", "gainsboro","black", "\n These pages are designed to help you with the many features built into the client." , "gainsboro","black", "\n These are the modules and features currently available, and the commands are in yellow." ) ColourTell ( "dimgray", "black", "\n\n [", "mediumpurple","black", "Status Gauges: ", "yellow","black", "Gauge Help", "dimgray", "black", "] [", "mediumpurple","black", "Utility Window: ", "yellow","black", "Utility Help", "dimgray", "black", "]", "dimgray", "black", " [", "mediumpurple","black", "Chat Window: ", "yellow","black", "Chat Help", "dimgray", "black", "]") ColourTell ( "dimgray", "black", "\n\n [", "mediumpurple","black", "Group Window: ", "yellow","black", "Demon Group Help", "dimgray", "black", "] [", "mediumpurple","black", "Exp Tracker: ", "yellow","black", "Track Help", "dimgray", "black", "] [", "mediumpurple","black", "Themes: ", "yellow","black", " Theme Help", "dimgray", "black", "]") ColourTell ( "dimgray", "black", "\n\n [", "mediumpurple","black", "Demon Auction: ", "yellow","black", "DemonAuc Help", "dimgray", "black", "] [", "mediumpurple","black", "Waypoints: ", "yellow","black", " Waypoint Help", "dimgray", "black", "] [", "mediumpurple","black", "Sound: ", "yellow","black", " Sound Help", "dimgray", "black", "]") ColourTell ( "dimgray", "black", "\n\n [", "mediumpurple","black", "MobKill Counter: ", "yellow","black", "Mobkill Help", "dimgray", "black", "] [", "mediumpurple","black", "Main Layout: ", "yellow","black", "Layout Help", "dimgray", "black", "] [", "mediumpurple","black", "Credits: ", "yellow","black", "Demon Credits", "dimgray", "black", "]")
ColourTell ("darkviolet", "black", "\n+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+-----------------+") end
